data.title: Decrypting messages
data.statement:
You received an message encrypted by taking the first letter of each word and creating an additional word at the beginning of the message from these letters.
Write a program to decrypt such encrypted messages.

testCases.title: Watch out for spaces
testCases.testOut: a b c d e f

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testOut: q w e r t y u i

testCases.title: Normal test
testCases.testIn: CATCF HARLIE ND HE HOCOLATE ACTORY

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: HPATGOF ARRY OTTER ND HE OBLET F IRE
testCases.testOut: HARRY POTTER AND THE GOBLET OF FIRE

data.constraints:
2 ≤ length of the message ≤ 100
Message consists only of letters and spaces.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You received an message encrypted by taking the first letter of each word and creating an additional word at the beginning of the message from these letters.
Write a program to decrypt such encrypted messages.
Input
Encrypted message m
Output
Decrypted message
Constraints
2 ≤ length of the message ≤ 100
Message consists only of letters and spaces.
Example
Input
Tiam his s  essage
Output
This is a message
